// Test locale file for the fake locale 'mc', used to test the
// ucat.h message catalog API.

mc
{
    1%4  { "Good morning." }
    1%5  { "Good afternoon." }
    1%7  { "Good evening." }
    1%8  { "Good night." }

    4%14 { "Please " }
    4%19 { "Thank you." }
    4%20 { "Sincerely," }
}

//eof
